name: OLIVE AND OLIVE OIL PRODUCTS OF CERTIFIED QUALITY
goal:
The non-profit civil partnership Society Olive and Olive Oil Products of Certified Quality (EL3P) is a professional organization of businesses, the main objective of which involves PDO/PGI products and/or organic agricultural products and/or integrated treatment crop management products in the olive oil and/or table olive sector.

Its establishment (2005) emerged after understanding the need to form a collective expression of businesses which have chosen the path of differentiation with products of certified quality, high added value and deriving from Greek production/processing/standardization procedures, compared to the corresponding standard products.

The members of the partnership are:
- businesses regardless of their legal form (private or cooperatives)
- small or very small businesses widely dispersed in olive farming regions
- businesses with exclusive exportation activities.

EL3P's endeavor is based on three axes: safeguarding the quality of its products, networking between the equally cooperative businesses and becoming extroverted towards markets throughout the world.

The objectives of EL3P for the period of 2009-2012 focus on:
a) improving the infrastructures of the businesses, by utilizing, amongst others, the programme for Operators' organizations in the Olive Sector, specified in Regulation No. 2080/05 and 867/08;
b) informing Greek consumers about the values of quality and hygiene of certified olive products,
c) undertaking activities for the collective promotion into the international market and
d) expanding its members, especially in areas which are not currently represented.

In order to achieve its basic objectives, the Company adopts the appropriate means and performs the following activities:
1. Creation of the necessary conditions for the restoration of stable structures by forming long-term contractual relations between producers and processing and/or trade businesses, which may expand to the end buyers.
2. Development, standardization and provision of consultation technical support and organizational support services regarding the application of quality management systems and environmental protection methods.
3. Provision of information, technical, financial, legal advice, facilitating its members to observe formal procedures throughout the period during which their products undergo a certification process, in accordance with acknowledged standards.
4. Development of stable cooperative relations with scientists of all relative fields in order to support and guide their scientific and, especially, their research work towards the development of innovations in the field of the production and distribution of olive products, as well as to utilize, popularize and disperse this work to all interested parties and, particularly, to the members of the Company.
5. Collectively projecting and promoting into the markets of the products of the members of the Company by taking initiatives and providing services in the fields of market research, marketing; participating in group activities, designing and establishing distinctive titles and brands; distributing through networks and informing consumers about the particular characteristics and attributes of the products.
6. Development and application of an integrated quality management system
for services provided by the Company and provision of a certification according to the ISO 9000 standard and any other international quality management standards.
7. Providing assistance, solidarity and support to the Company's members; setting codes of conduct and an internal self-audit system; protecting its members and their products against unfair competition and against cases in which consumers are misled.
8.Public communication and projection of the issues, with which the Company and its members are concerned, through printed material and electronic means, as well as through any other means available, i.e., discussions, seminars, conferences, etc.
